ValidationRule.description: Transfer to Amendments to only allow it to be selected if the 'ESR Category 1' dropdown is marked with "Amendment" or "Assessment"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( Action__c ,"Pending Amendment"), ISPICKVAL( Action__c ,"Transferred to Amendments")), NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL( ESRService__c , "Amendment"), ISPICKVAL( ESRService__c , "Assessment"))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Transfer to Amendments can only be selected if 'ESR Category 1' is marked with "Amendment" or "Assessment"
